name: CVE-2010-0719
description: An unspecified API in Microsoft Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, and Windows 7 does not validate arguments, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) via a crafted application.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2000:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:gold:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
